examples.example: 前方路口请右拐，便能看到那片美丽的花海，真是令人惊喜。

translate.english: Turn right at the front intersection, then you can see that beautiful flower sea. It is really a pleasant surprise.

examples.example: 我们沿着街道直行，到了交叉路口再右拐就能到达目的地了。

translate.english: We go straight along the street, and then turn right at the intersection to reach the destination.

examples.example: 当你走到这条街的尽头右拐，就会发现一个充满欢乐的小广场。

translate.english: When you walk to the end of this street and turn right, you will find a small square full of joy.
